front-end.title: Here are free resources to learn and practice front-end web development

options.title: W3Schools.com
options.more_info: W3Schools is a tutorial site for learning web development

options.title: FreeCodeCamp
options.more_info: FreeCodeCamp is an NGO that provides programming courses for free

options.title: CS50 HTML
options.more_info: CS50 is a course in Harvard that provides classes for different programming languages

options.title: CodeCademy
options.more_info: Codecademy is an education centre that provides free courses for programming

options.title: SoloLearn
options.more_info: With SoloLearn you can easily learn and practice programming on your phone

options.title: Traversy Media
options.more_info: Practice your skills by building projects with Brad Traversy for free. You will also learn some frameworks in this channel

options.title: Design Course
options.more_info: Learn the concepts of designing a website, and build projects with Gary Simons

options.title: More YouTube Resources
options.more_info: Get more youtube resources, channels to develop your skills as a front-end developer
